name: devils-coin-ecosystem
description: Devil's Coin - Complete cryptocurrency ecosystem with PoS blockchain

scripts.install-all: npm run install-contracts && npm run install-backend && npm run install-frontend
scripts.build-all: npm run build-contracts && npm run build-backend && npm run build-frontend
scripts.build-backend: cd backend && echo 'Backend does not require build step'
scripts.test-all: npm run test-contracts && npm run test-backend && npm run test-frontend
scripts.clean: npm run clean-contracts && npm run clean-backend && npm run clean-frontend
scripts.clean-contracts: cd contracts && rm -rf node_modules artifacts cache
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev-contracts" "npm run dev-backend" "npm run dev-frontend"
scripts.setup-env: cp contracts/.env.example contracts/.env && cp backend/.env.example backend/.env && cp frontend/.env.example frontend/.env
scripts.lint: npm run lint-backend && npm run lint-frontend
scripts.format: npm run format-backend && npm run format-frontend
scripts.audit: npm audit && cd contracts && npm audit && cd ../backend && npm audit && cd ../frontend && npm audit
scripts.update-deps: npm update && cd contracts && npm update && cd ../backend && npm update && cd ../frontend && npm update

author: Devil's Coin Team
